summary:
Made for Detailers, Sold Direct. - Melbourne Made Premium Car Care Products.

 SiO₂ Ceramic Sealant - Utilising Silicon Dioxide (Si02) Nano Ceramic Quartz Technology Aqua Kote ensures a highly durable sealant in a single spray application.

 Thickest Snow Foam - Specifically designed to create the thickest possible blanket of Snow Foam.
